amendment.description: Amendment requires the GAO to submit a biennial report to Congress on the debt and revenue levels of each territory; the drivers of each territory's debt; the effect of Federal policy on each territory's debt; and the ability of each territory to repay its debt.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-610 to require GAO to submit an biannual report to Congress on the debt and revenue levels of each territory, the drivers of each territory's debt, the effect of federal policy on each territory's debt, and the ability of each territory to repay its debt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Byrne.
